forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West wind around 14 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 13 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the cool air carries a promise of a beautiful day ahead. With the night’s clear canopy giving way to sunlit skies, a gentle west wind stirs, rustling leaves and whispering through the city’s streets. Morning temperatures hover comfortably in the low fifties, an invitation for layers—a light sweater over a t-shirt should suffice for those venturing out at this tranquil hour. 

By midday, the sun will reign with a high near 64, casting a warm glow on the vibrant cityscape while a refreshing breeze picks up, drawing dramatic movement in the trees and sending the occasional burst of laughter from passersby. The fog, ever the elusive character of this city, remains at bay today, hinting only at its presence along the distant hills. As the afternoon approaches, the temperatures will cool slightly, nudging toward 62 as the breeze strengthens, making a stroll through parks or a visit to a café for a hot beverage a delightful way to enjoy the day. Those craving a taste of the bay area’s charm will find joy in simply meandering through bustling streets, perhaps indulging in an impromptu moment of people-watching or basking in the artful scene of the waterfront.
